name: Journey Of Ethan VR
description:
Journey of Ethan into a magical world is a combination of first person shooter and 3rd person platformer. 

Ethan and Adam are best friends. Ethan is trapped into a magical game world. Adam using his VR headset guides and protect Ethan from many dangers posed by the mystic world to reach the end of the magical world. Reaching end releases Ethan from the world.

Play in as Adam and save Ethan from the mystic world.

This is just a DEMO the game is under development.

Controls:

1. Ethan keeps moving unless u ask him to stop ( right thumb stick back).

2.Ethan direction control using right thumb stick

3. shoot using right trigger.

4. pause using thumb middle button.

SUPPORTS OCULUS QUEST AND PCVR.

You can follow our development at out YouTube channel Gamerz-At-Work 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh4O81NMdDkzxMlU15_R2Aw
